title.rendered: #DemystifySFProducts on Community Cloud with Meighan Brodkey

content.rendered:
#DemystifySFProducts on Community Cloud with Meighan Brodkey
Vijayawada, India Developers GroupJune 30, 2020


Overview


Vijayawada, India Developers Group

This video is all about Vijayawada, India Developers Group most fun-loving, informative, and successful session of #DemystifySFProducts on Community Cloud with Meighan Brodkey.In this video, we are having the fun filling activity with our guest speaker that is Rapid Fire with Marvelous Meighan.We are coming with an initiative called #DemystifySFProducts, where we are going to Demystify the existing Salesforce products with the help of industry expert speakers who are having the immense knowledge and experience in that particular product. Also, for the coming few weeks, we will be demystifying almost all the Salesforce products for you along with motivation and fun.In this session, we have Salesforce MVP, Technical Architect, WIT Leader, and Community Cloud expert none other than Meighan Brodkey to give you the necessary level of knowledge on Community Cloud along with learning resources.

Join Here


Thamalalla Venkata Seshagiri Rao #VCGF20


Twitter


Suresh Chundi


Twitter


Juturi Chinna Babu #VCGF20


Twitter



Chatter Group


Join Group


Trailblazer Community Groups


View Page


Event Details


View Event

Meighan Brodkey

Salesforce MVP and Technical Architect then Technical Architect that also Manages the Architecture Practice. Meighan went from admin to architect, taking the long path, and enjoyed the whole trip, gaining from the experiences and uses the admin, consultant, and prior in house life the better model projects from solution to deployment. Blogger – meighanrockssf.com, World Traveler for Salesforce – presented at Surf Force, North Africa Dreamin, YeurDreamin and more, taught admins and devs in the West Bank in 2017, 7x Dreamforce speaker, co-host of Salesforce Developer Podcast System Dot Debug, Ohana Slack admin & co-founder (learn about OhanaSlack here and sign up here). 

My Socials
Keep up to date by following us on these popular social networks.








Resources

FFDemystify Community Cloud – Your Opportunity To Shine Externally from Meighan Brodkey

excerpt.rendered:
Vijayawada, India Developers Group most fun-loving, informative, and successful session of #DemystifySFProducts on Community Cloud with Meighan Brodkey
Session Link

Cinco De Mayo for Salesforce YYC!!
Join the Calgary User Group and me to learn about Community Cloud use cases for Partner, Customer, and unauthenticated Communities.we’ll dive into the different ways you can use Communities from submitting Leads and Opportunities, Self Service help portals, sharing content and more! Learn about how others use Community Cloud to connect, build their brand and better relationships; inspiring you to see the infinite possibilities for you and your Community.
